text: bhūmiyil avar ahaṅkariccu naṭakkukayuṁ, duṣicca tantraṁ kaikkeāḷḷukayuṁ ceyyunnatinālāṇ at‌. duṣicca tantraṁ (atinṟe phalaṁ) at prayēāgiccavaril tanneyāṇ vannubhavikkuka. appēāḷ pūrvvikanmāruṭe kāryattil uṇṭāya naṭapaṭikramamallāte entāṇavar kāttirikkunnat‌? allāhuvinṟe naṭapaṭikramattin yāteāru bhēdagatiyuṁ nī kaṇṭettukayilla. allāhuvinṟe naṭapaṭikramattin yāteāru māṟṟavuṁ nī kaṇṭettukayilla
